title: Multilingual School Website for Dwarika Mohini Medha Montesary School

requirements.text: On initial page load, display a full-screen language selection modal or splash screen that prompts the visitor to choose between English and Hindi. The chosen language must persist for the session and control all visible text across the entire site.

quotes: Give an option on page load to choose english or hindi as language

acceptanceCriteria: A language selector appears immediately on page load before any other content is shown
Two options are clearly presented: English and Hindi (हिंदी)
Selecting a language dismisses the modal and renders the full site in that language
All user-facing strings on the page change based on the selected language
A language toggle button remains visible in the header to switch languages at any time

requirements.text: Display a prominent school header/hero section with the full school name 'Dwarika Mohini Medha Montesary School' and location 'Shuklaganj, Unnao'. Include a school tagline or motto in both languages.

quotes: School name: Dwarika Mohini Medha Montesary School

acceptanceCriteria: School name 'Dwarika Mohini Medha Montesary School' is prominently displayed in the hero section
Location 'Shuklaganj, Unnao' is shown beneath or near the school name
The hero section adapts its text to the selected language

requirements.text: Create a 'Classes' section listing all classes from Class 1 to Class 5. Each class card should display the class name/number, a brief description of the curriculum focus appropriate for that grade level (in both English and Hindi), and any relevant highlights such as subjects taught or age range.
acceptanceCriteria: All five classes (Class 1 through Class 5) are displayed as individual cards or sections
Each class entry includes the class name, a short description, and relevant info (subjects, age range)
Class descriptions display in the currently selected language (English or Hindi)
The section is clearly labeled and easy to navigate

requirements.text: Implement a Contact Us section with a form that allows any visitor to reach the school. The form must include fields for: Full Name, Email Address, Phone Number, Subject/Inquiry Type, and Message. On submission, store the contact inquiry in the backend and show a success confirmation to the user.

quotes: some form to fill so anyone can contact this

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes fields: Full Name, Email, Phone Number, Subject, and Message
All fields have appropriate validation (required fields, email format, phone format)
Form labels and placeholder text render in the selected language
On successful submission, the inquiry is saved to the backend canister
A clear success message is shown to the user after submission
The form resets after a successful submission

requirements.text: Apply a warm, traditional yet modern visual theme suited for a local primary school in India. Use earthy tones such as saffron, deep green, and cream/ivory as the primary palette. Use a clean, readable typography pairing — one serif-style font for headings and a clean sans-serif for body text. The layout should be welcoming and accessible, with ample whitespace, rounded card elements, and subtle decorative motifs.
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm earthy tones (saffron/orange, deep green, cream) consistently throughout
Heading font is distinct from body font, with both being highly legible
All sections use rounded cards and consistent spacing
The design feels welcoming and appropriate for a primary school audience
The site is responsive and looks good on both desktop and mobile

requirements.text: Render the generated school logo and hero banner images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: School logo image is displayed in the navigation header
Hero banner image is displayed in the hero/top section of the page
Images are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated

constraints: School name must always appear exactly as: Dwarika Mohini Medha Montesary School
Location must appear as: Shuklaganj, Unnao
All user-facing text must be available in both English and Hindi
Contact form submissions must be persisted in the Motoko backend canister
nonGoals: No student login or authentication system
No fee payment or online admission portal
No real-time notifications or email sending
No admin dashboard for managing content

required: Warm illustrated school crest / logo with lotus flower and open book motif in saffron, green, and cream colors (school-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Wide hero banner illustration of a cheerful school building surrounded by trees and children in a warm sunrise setting with saffron and green tones (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
